main event: A civilian observed a balloon-shaped object slowly descending towards the earth for about 30-40 minutes in Marysville, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object had a red light on top and a yellow light on the bottom., The object was tracked by ground control during the observation., There were many flights of upper air research balloons in the area during this period., The sighting was reported by multiple civilian witnesses., The conclusion of the report was that the observed object was possibly a balloon.
